name: TextItem
shortdesc: The text object contained in an art layer.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The object's container.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: antiAliasMethod
property.shortdesc: The method of anti-aliasing to use.

property.name: autoKerning
property.shortdesc: Options for auto kerning.

property.name: color
property.shortdesc: The text color.

property.name: useAutoLeading
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the font's built-in leading information.

property.name: tracking
property.shortdesc: The amount of uniform spacing between multiple characters. Range: -1000 to 10000.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: Character scaling (vertical) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: Character scaling (horizontal) in proportion to horizontal scale. Range: 0 - 1000 as a percentage.

property.name: baselineShift
property.shortdesc: The amount of baseline offset of text.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The actual text in the layer.

property.name: font
property.shortdesc: The text face of the character.

property.name: leading
property.shortdesc: The leading amount.

property.name: ligatures
property.shortdesc: If true, ligatures are used.

property.name: alternateLigatures
property.shortdesc: If true, alternate ligatures are used.

property.name: oldStyle
property.shortdesc: If true, old style is used.

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: The position of the origin for the text. The array must contain two values. Setting this property is basically equivalent to clicking the text tool at a point in the document to create the point of origin for text.

property.name: direction
property.shortdesc: The text orientation.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The font size.

property.name: fauxBold
property.shortdesc: If true, faux bold is used.

property.name: fauxItalic
property.shortdesc: If true, faux italic is used.

property.name: capitalization
property.shortdesc: The case of the text.

property.name: strikeThru
property.shortdesc: The strike through option to use.

property.name: underline
property.shortdesc: Options for underlining the text.

property.name: language
property.shortdesc: The language.

property.name: noBreak
property.shortdesc: If true, words are not allowed to break at the end of a line. When enacted on large amounts of consecutive characters, can prevent word wrap and thus may prevent some text from appearing on the screen.

property.name: kind
property.shortdesc: The type of text.

property.name: justification
property.shortdesc: The paragraph justification.

property.name: leftIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent text from the left. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: firstLineIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent the first line of paragraphs. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: rightIndent
property.shortdesc: The amount to indent text from the right. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: spaceBefore
property.shortdesc: The amount of space before each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: spaceAfter
property.shortdesc: The amount of space after each paragraph. Range: -1296 to 1296.

property.name: hangingPuntuation
property.shortdesc: If true, uses Roman hanging punctuation.

property.name: textComposer
property.shortdesc: The text composing engine to use.

property.name: hyphenation
property.shortdesc: If true, hyphenation is used.

property.name: minimumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The desired amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumGlyphScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) to scale the horizontal size of the text letters. Range: 50 - 200; at 100, the width of characters is not scaled. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: minimumLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 to 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The amount of space (as a percentage) between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumLetterScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between letters. Range: 100 - 500; at 0, no space is added between letters. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: minimumWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The minimum amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: desiredWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The amount (as a percentage) of space between words. Range: 0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words. Valid only for justified text.

property.name: maximumWordScaling
property.shortdesc: The maximum amount (as a percentage) of space between words (0 -1000; at 100, no additional space is added between words). Valid only for justified text.

property.name: autoLeadingAmount
property.shortdesc: The percentage to use for auto leading. Range: 0.01 to 5000.00.

property.name: hyphenateWordsLongerThan
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of letters a word must have in order for hyphenation in word wrap to be allowed. Range: 2 to 25.

property.name: hyphenateAfterFirst
property.shortdesc: The number of letters after which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

property.name: hyphenateBeforeLast
property.shortdesc: The number of letters before which hyphenation in word wrap is allowed. Range: 1 to 15.

property.name: hyphenLimit
property.shortdesc: The maximum number of consecutive lines that can end with a hyphenated word.

property.name: hyphenationZone
property.shortdesc: The distance at the end of a line that will cause a word to break in unjustified type. Range: 0 - 720 picas.

property.name: hyphenateCapitalWords
property.shortdesc: If true, capitalized words can be hyphenated.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width of the bounding box for paragraph text.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height of the bounding box for paragraph text.

property.name: warpStyle
property.shortdesc: The style of warp.

property.name: warpDirection
property.shortdesc: The warp direction.

property.name: warpBend
property.shortdesc: The warp bend percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

property.name: warpHorizontalDistortion
property.shortdesc: The warp horizontal distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

property.name: warpVerticalDistortion
property.shortdesc: The warp vertical distortion percentage. Range: -100 to 100.

method.name: createPath
method.shortdesc: Creates a clipping path from the outlines of the actual text items (such as letters or words).

method.name: convertToShape
method.shortdesc: Converts the text object and its containing layer to a fill layer with the text changed to a clipping path.
